summary: In rural Sweden of the early 1950s, little Elina goes to school again after recovering from tuberculosis, the same illness that has killed her father a few years earlier. Elina's family ... See full summary »
cast: Natalie Minnevik|Bibi Andersson|Marjaana Maijala|Henrik Rafaelsen|Tind Soneby|Björn Granath|Jarl Lindblad|Sara Arnia|Peter Rogers|Carolina Berggren|Amanda Andersson|Zorro Svärdendahl
title: Elina - Som om jag inte fanns
